statements: SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses
SELECT ip_address FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE reason = 'spam'
SELECT reason, ip_address FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses ORDER BY ip_address ASC
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE ip_address IN ('192.168.1.1', '10.0.0.1')
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%' ORDER BY reason ASC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS count FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses GROUP BY ip_address HAVING count > 1;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE reason IS NOT NULL AND ip_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT DISTINCT reason FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE reason NOT LIKE '%phishing%' ORDER BY reason DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason = 'Suspicious activity'
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.%'
SELECT reason, ip_address FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%'
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY ip_address DESC
SELECT ip_address, UPPER(reason) AS UpperCaseReason FROM blacklisted_ips
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason = 'Suspicious activity';
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT ip_address, LENGTH(reason) AS reason_length FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE LENGTH(reason) > 50;
SELECT ip_address, UPPER(reason) AS reason_upper FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_blacklisted_ips FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT * FROM BlacklistedIPs;
SELECT ip_address, expiration_date FROM BlacklistedIPs WHERE reason = 'spam';
SELECT * FROM BlacklistLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ip_address, log_description FROM BlacklistLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, last_login FROM AdminUsers WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_login;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM BlacklistedIPs;
SELECT * FROM BlacklistLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM BlacklistLogs GROUP BY ip_address HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5;
SELECT username, last_login FROM AdminUsers WHERE last_login > now() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT * FROM AdminUsers ORDER BY last_login ASC, admin_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT id, ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';

SELECT log_id, ip_address, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklist_ips WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT admin_id, action_name, timestamp FROM admin_actions WHERE admin_id = 2;

SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklist_ips WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username ASC;
